trans-unit.source: Represents the structure, or schema, of a data field.
trans-unit.target: 代表結構描述中的，資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetFieldSchema class to get the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得使用<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>資料欄位的屬性使用 DataSetFieldSchema 類別

trans-unit.source: You can discover the structure of a data field by using the following properties in this class: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此類別中的下列內容來探索資料欄位的結構︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A> property to determine if a data column is set for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> property to determine if a data column is in the primary key.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>屬性來判斷資料行是否設定為<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A>屬性來判斷是否資料行是主索引鍵。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataSetFieldSchema class is used by custom control designer components to provide information about a data field at design time.
trans-unit.target: DataSetFieldSchema 類別可由自訂控制項的設計工具元件來提供設計階段資料欄位的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: To examine the components of data using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the following classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查的資料使用的元件<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，使用下列類別。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> - DataSetFieldSchema
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>-DataSetFieldSchema</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> class using a specified <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class to examine the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>類別來檢查資料的欄位使用的內容<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> object describes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref>物件描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of data stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存的資料欄位中的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type of data the data field contains.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>包含物件，代表資料的資料欄位的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the value of the data field automatically increments for each new row added to the table or view.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料欄位的值是否自動遞增每個新資料列加入至資料表或檢視表。

trans-unit.source: The Identity property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 識別屬性會對應至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A><xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*> is numeric and the value of the column increments automatically as new rows are added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>是數值和資料行遞增的值會自動加入新的資料列時<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料欄位是唯讀的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether values in the data field are required to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在資料欄位的值都必須是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The IsUnique property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: IsUnique 屬性會對應至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A><xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in the data field is unique; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料欄位中的資料是唯一的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the size of data that can be stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出可儲存的資料欄位中的資料大小。

trans-unit.source: The Length property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Length 屬性對應至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A><xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes the column can store.
trans-unit.target: 資料行可以儲存的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: [名稱] 屬性對應至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A><xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: 資料欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可接受的資料欄位<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The Nullable property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 可為 Null 的屬性會對應至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A><xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以接受資料欄位<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of digits used to represent a numerical value in the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來表示數值資料欄位中的數字的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The Precision property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: 有效位數屬性需要<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>介面，但不是由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field is in the primary key for the containing table or view.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料欄位包含的資料表或檢視表的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is in the primary key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料欄位是主索引鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of decimal places to which numerical values in the data field are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 取得要解析的資料欄位中的數值小數位數數目。

trans-unit.source: The Scale property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數屬性需要<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>介面，但不是由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠會傳回-1。
